issue.title: Ensure the Type, TypeUnion, and TypeIntersect types from cspray/typiphy are incorporated correctly

milestone.title: v0.6 Release
milestone.description: The final high-level features we expect to be part of the 1.0 release.

issue.body:
Currently the `InjectDefinition` and the `ParameterStore` are reliant on the `Type` interface from `cspray/typiphy`. However, neither of these interfaces are properly handling all of the potential interfaces that might result from parsing a codebase.

The `InjectDefinition::getType` method only returns a union of `Type|TypeUnion` when it should return a union of `Type|TypeUnion|TypeIntersect`. The `ParameterStore::fetch` method has a parameter that accepts a `Type` but should accept a `Type|TypeUnion|TypeIntersect`. Additionally, a more thorough search of the codebase for other places that might not be expecting all 3 possible Typiphy types.

commits.message:
Bug/type intersect union (#101)

* Support TypeIntersect for Inject params

* Support Type, TypeUnion, and TypeIntersect with InjectDefinitions

* Add union and intereset support to ParameterStore

issue.title: Allow retrieving a collection of Services matching a given type

milestone.title: v0.6 Release
milestone.description: The final high-level features we expect to be part of the 1.0 release.

comment.body: When you think about it, the `#[Inject]` Attribute is already responsible for deciding what values get used when they can't be resolved implicitly. Instead of introducing a new Attribute, and everything else that entails, we should instead adjust the way the `#[Inject]` Attribute is handled to support this. Really, there's nothing to do from the `#[InjectAttribute]` or `InjectDefinition` side. Instead, need to determine if variadic arguments are supported (probably not at first) and to adjust the `ContainerFactory` tests and implementations to handle this use case.

release.name: v0.1.0
release.body:
## What's Changed
* Feature/annotated target options builder by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/1
* Feature/target parser by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/2
* Feature/functional api by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/3
* Add documentation by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/4
* Create CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/5
* Create LICENSE by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/6
* Add license, authors, changelog by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/7

## New Contributors
* @cspray made their first contribution in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/annotated-target/commits/v0.1.0
